title: mouseOverActor and pointerOverActors are not cleared in Stage#clear()
body:
I would assume that when I call [`Stage#clear()`](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/bf32f0fbebeab7df0b0f257ea0fd3d9fbc549eff/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/scenes/scene2d/Stage.java#L591-L595) or [`Stage#dispose()`](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/bf32f0fbebeab7df0b0f257ea0fd3d9fbc549eff/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/scenes/scene2d/Stage.java#L841-L845), that all references to `Actor`s in the `Stage` are cleared. 

However, that is not the case. If the fields [`private final Actor[] pointerOverActors = new Actor[20];`](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/bf32f0fbebeab7df0b0f257ea0fd3d9fbc549eff/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/scenes/scene2d/Stage.java#L75) or [`private @Null Actor mouseOverActor;`](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/bf32f0fbebeab7df0b0f257ea0fd3d9fbc549eff/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/scenes/scene2d/Stage.java#L80) contain a reference to an `Actor`, those persist until the next call of [`Stage#act(float)`](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/bf32f0fbebeab7df0b0f257ea0fd3d9fbc549eff/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/scenes/scene2d/Stage.java#L193-L227).

I think `Stage#clear()` should set these fields to `null`.

---

Context: I had the problem that I called `Stage.dispose`, assuming that its children would get garbage-collected. However, that didn't happen as long as I kept a reference to the `Stage` itself. Only when I let go of the reference to the stage (or called `act()` one last time) did the memory the children used actually become available.
